example:
() => (
  <Stack>
    <NotificationBadge ariaLabel="Train" type="info" icon={<Icons.Train />}>
      Train
    </NotificationBadge>
    <NotificationBadge ariaLabel="Train" type="info" icon={<Icons.Train />} />
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Icons
info.description: If you include an icon, it will override the content. Notification badges with icons look the same with and without content (the content doesn't work as accessible text).
